name: Animal Companion Abilities
desc: Enhance your companion with the following abilities.

options.name: Big
options.desc: Step up STR and Attack.

options.name: Fast
options.desc: Step up DEX and gain +2 Grit

options.name: Clever
options.desc: Step up WIL, it can communicate with anyone flawlessly.

options.name: Vicious
options.desc: Step up Attack, and gain an extra effect (e.g. poison, armor piercing, blast, etc.).

options.name: Flying
options.desc: Through wings or other means.

options.name: Tiny
options.desc: +2 Grit, can be easily concealed.

options.name: Invertebrate
options.desc: No bones! +2 Grit and can fit into nearly any space.

options.name: Durable
options.desc: +1 Armor (scales, plates, evasion, exoskeleton, etc.).

options.name: Marsupial
options.desc: Has a pouch which can carry a single bulky item.

options.name: Perceptive
options.desc: Has some enhanced sense (smelling, hearing, echolocation, electroception, dowsing, night vision, etc.)

options.name: Tricky
options.desc: +2 Grit and a special skill.

options.name: Special
options.desc: Some other unique thing (good at digging, chromatophores, is a swarm, etc.)

name: Artifice Improvements
desc: Enhance your equipment with the following abilities.

options.name: Deadly
options.desc: Step up damage die.

options.name: Heavy
options.desc: Step up damage die, add bulky. Effective at damaging structures.

options.name: Capsule
options.desc: Delivers a liquid on Direct Damage

options.name: Ranged
options.desc: Attacks at a distance.

options.name: Ethereal
options.desc: Deals Direct Damage to WIL, injures non-physical targets.

options.name: Paired
options.desc: You have two of them.

options.name: Entangling
options.desc: Deals Direct Damage to DEX, trips or staggers on Critical Damage.

options.name: Extra Protection
options.desc: +1 Armor, add bulky.

options.name: Ward
options.desc: +1 Armor against a specific threat.

options.name: Locomoting
options.desc: Grants a form of movement

options.name: Light
options.desc: remove bulky tag.

options.name: Transforming
options.desc: Swaps between types.

options.name: Concealed
options.desc: Collapses or hides.

options.name: Sentient
options.desc: Has a mind of its own.

options.name: Detecting
options.desc: Sense a specific thing, or grant a specific type of perception.

options.name: Special
options.desc: A unique quality or ability.

name: Water Blessing
desc: Choose the blessing your Patron grants you.

options.name: Fluid Form
options.desc: Freely turn into water and back into your normal state.

options.name: Font of Self
options.desc: You can produce water at will, the same volume you can control per hour.

options.name: Water Sight
options.desc: Once per day when you immerse yourself in a body of water you may ask your Patron one question about something that water touches.

options.name: Thermo Regulation
options.desc: Freely change the state of water within your control (between gas, liquid, and solid). If used offensively, step up the damage your One With the Water deals.

options.name: Tip Of The Iceberg
options.desc: Your volume of water you can control expands 10 fold.

options.name: Healing Waters
options.desc: Stabilize wounds by pouring water over them. Restore a damaged Attribute to maximum after 6 hours.

name: Devoted Vows
desc: These apply only to you, not your companions.

options.name: Honesty
options.desc: You may not tell a lie, or engage in dishonest tactics.

options.name: Poverty
options.desc: You may not own money, gold, or gems.

options.name: Mercy
options.desc: You must accept offers of surrender, and you must honor good faith requests for assistance.

options.name: Stability
options.desc: You must complete any task, journey, or quest you undertake.

options.name: Nonviolence
options.desc: You may never initiate violence unless it is in defense of yourself or another.

options.name: Observance
options.desc: You must complete a ritual or task (something inconvenient) in each location you visit.

options.name: By Will Sustained
options.desc: You do not need to eat, drink, breathe, or sleep.

options.name: Unsullied Truth
options.desc: You always know if someone is lying, or if something is hidden by illusion or glamour in your presence.

options.name: Can’t Stop Won’t Stop
options.desc: Direct Damage you suffer never overflows your current STR die. After you take Critical Damage restore your Grit to Max.

options.name: Weapon of Faith
options.desc: Choose an improvement from the Artificer’s Improvement list (Pg 27). Weapons you hold gain that Improvement.

options.name: Healing Touch
options.desc: Stabilize a wound immediately. With a night’s focus completely restore an Attribute to Max.

options.name: Minor Miracle
options.desc: You have the ability to perform a minor miracle related to your devotion.

options.name: Air
options.desc: breath, wind

options.name: Fire
options.desc: burning, heat

options.name: Earth
options.desc: solidity, weight

options.name: Water
options.desc: liquid, change

options.name: Enhance
options.desc: addition, amplification

options.name: Impair
options.desc: reduction, suppression

options.name: Move
options.desc: motive force, relocation

options.name: Create
options.desc: production, renewal

options.name: Destroy
options.desc: removal, decay

options.name: Self
options.desc: the element itself

options.name: Object
options.desc: an inanimate object

options.name: Creature
options.desc: a living thing
